content.text: Hi, my name is [user 1]. I'm on my way to UC Santa Cruz, where I was accepted to study computer science. What about you?
Hi, I'm [user 2]. I work in advertising and I like to hike. I have a golden retriever and I write fiction for fun.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to try hiking.
You should! It's a great way to get exercise and see some beautiful scenery.
What do you like to write fiction about?
I like to write about different genres, but my favorite is fantasy.
That sounds really cool! I've never tried writing fiction before.
You should give it a try! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem. So, what are you looking forward to most about college?
I'm looking forward to meeting new people and learning new things.
That's what I was looking forward to the most when I started college. It's a great experience.
I'm also looking forward to being more independent.
That's also a big part of college. It's a great time to learn how to take care of yourself.
